Get the version of the java-h4toh5 library.

H4toh5open
public static int H4toh5open(java.lang.String hdf4file,
                             java.lang.String hdf5file) throws H45Exception
          Initialize the h4 to h5 library. The return value is the h4toh5id that must be passed to subsequent library calls.
Parameters:
hdf4file - (IN) The HDF4 file (input). The files is open to read.
hdf5file - (IN) The HDF5 file (output). If the file does not exist, it will be created.
Returns:
The h45id, used in subsequent calls.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
H4toh5close
public static void H4toh5close(int h45id) throws H45Exception
          Terminate access and free resources of the h4 to h5 library for the session identified by h45id.

the program should close all HDDF4 and HDF5 before calling this.

Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id returned from H4toh5open.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
H4toh5basvgroup
public static void H4toh5basvgroup(int h45id,
                                   int vgid,
                                   java.lang.String parent,
                                   java.lang.String group,
                                   int vg_flag,
                                   int attr_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert a vgroup from HDF4 to a group in HDF5, optionally converting members of the vgroup that are not vgroups.
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
vgid - (IN) The vgroup ID, returned by HDF4 Vattach.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted group should be inserted.
group - (IN) The name of the HDF5 group to create.
vg_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the members
  • 0 = don't convert
  • 1 = convert all elements of the Vgroup that are not Vgroups
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the vgroup
  • 0 = don't convert
  • 1 = convert all attributes of the Vgroup into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 group.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5advgroup
H4toh5basvgroup
public static void H4toh5basvgroup(int h45id,
                                   int vgid,
                                   java.lang.String parent,
                                   java.lang.String group,
                                   boolean vg_flag,
                                   boolean attr_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert a vgroup from HDF4 to a group in HDF5, optionally converting members of the vgroup that are not vgroups.
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
vgid - (IN) The vgroup ID, returned by HDF4 Vattach.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted group should be inserted.
group - (IN) The name of the HDF5 group to create.
vg_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the members
  • false = don't convert
  • true = convert all elements of the Vgroup that are not Vgroups
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the vgroup
  • false = don't convert
  • true = convert all attributes of the Vgroup into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 group.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5advgroup
H4toh5advgroup
public static void H4toh5advgroup(int h45id,
                                  int vgid,
                                  java.lang.String parent,
                                  java.lang.String group) throws H45Exception
          Convert a vgroup from HDF4 to a group in HDF5, recursively converting all the members of the vgroup including other vgroups.

Caution: This function should be used carefully, especially when the structure of the HDF4 Vgroup may be complicated.

Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
vgid - (IN) The vgroup ID, returned by HDF4 Vattach.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted grup should be inserted.
group - (IN) The name of the HDF5 group to create.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5basvgroup
H4toh5vdata
public static void H4toh5vdata(int h45id,
                               int vgid,
                               java.lang.String parent,
                               java.lang.String name,
                               int attr_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert a vdata from HDF4 to a dataset in HDF5.
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
vdid - (IN) The vdata ID, returned by HDF4 VSattach.
name - (IN) The name of the HDF5 dataset to create.
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the vdata
  • 0 = don't convert
  • 1 = convert all attributes of the Vdata into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 dataset.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
H4toh5vdata
public static void H4toh5vdata(int h45id,
                               int vgid,
                               java.lang.String parent,
                               java.lang.String name,
                               boolean attr_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert a vdata from HDF4 to a dataset in HDF5.
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
vgid - (IN) The vdata ID, returned by HDF4 VSattach.
name - (IN) The name of the HDF5 dataset to create.
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the vdata
  • false = don't convert
  • true = convert all attributes of the Vdata into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 dataset.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
H4toh5sds
public static void H4toh5sds(int h45id,
                             int sdsid,
                             java.lang.String parent,
                             java.lang.String dsetname,
                             java.lang.String dimgroupname,
                             int dim_flag,
                             int attr_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert a SDS from HDF4 to a dataset in HDF5, with appropriate data type.
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
sdsid - (IN) The SD ID, returned by HDF4 SDselect.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted dataset should be inserted.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 dataset to create.
dim_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the dimension scales into HDF5 datasets.
  • 0 = don't convert
  • 1 = convert all dimension scales of the SDS
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the SDS
  • 0 = don't convert
  • 1 = convert all attributes of the SDS into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 dataset.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
H4toh5sds
public static void H4toh5sds(int h45id,
                             int sdsid,
                             java.lang.String parent,
                             java.lang.String dsetname,
                             java.lang.String dimgroupname,
                             boolean dim_flag,
                             boolean attr_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert a SDS from HDF4 to a dataset in HDF5, with appropriate data type.
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
sdsid - (IN) The SD ID, returned by HDF4 SDselect.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted dataset should be inserted.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 dataset to create.
dim_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the dimension scales into HDF5 datasets.
  • false = don't convert
  • true = convert all dimension scales of the SDS
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the SDS
  • false = don't convert
  • true = convert all attributes of the SDS into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 dataset.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5advgroup
H4toh5image
public static void H4toh5image(int h45id,
                               int riid,
                               java.lang.String parent,
                               java.lang.String dsetname,
                               java.lang.String palpath,
                               java.lang.String palname,
                               int attr_flag,
                               int pal_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert a raster image from HDF4 to an image dataset in HDF5, optionally converting associated palettes.
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
grid - (IN) The GR image ID, returned by HDF4 GRselect.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted image should be inserted.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 image dataset to create.
palpath - (IN) The absolute path of the HDF5 group to store the palette dataset.
palname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 palette dataset.
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the image
  • 0 = don't convert
  • 1 = convert all attributes of the image into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 group.
pal_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the palette of the image
  • 0 = don't convert
  • 1 = convert the palette as well as the image
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5pal
H4toh5image
public static void H4toh5image(int h45id,
                               int riid,
                               java.lang.String parent,
                               java.lang.String dsetname,
                               java.lang.String palpath,
                               java.lang.String palname,
                               boolean attr_flag,
                               boolean pal_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert a raster image from HDF4 to an image dataset in HDF5, optionally converting associated palettes.
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
riid - (IN) The GR image ID, returned by HDF4 GRselect.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted image should be inserted.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 image dataset to create.
palpath - (IN) The absolute path of the HDF5 group to store the palette dataset.
palname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 palette dataset.
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the image
  • false = don't convert
  • true = convert all attributes of the image into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 group.
pal_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the palette of the image
  • false = don't convert the palette
  • true = convert the palette as well as the image
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5pal
H4toh5pal
public static void H4toh5pal(int h45id,
                             int riid,
                             java.lang.String parent,
                             java.lang.String dsetname,
                             java.lang.String palgroup,
                             java.lang.String paldset,
                             int attr_flag,
                             int ref_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert a palette from HDF4 to an palette dataset in HDF5,
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
grid - (IN) The GR image ID of an image that refers to the palette, returned by HDF4 GRselect.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted palette should be inserted.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 image dataset to attach the palette (if none, null).
palgroup - (IN) The absolute path of the HDF5 group to store the palette dataset.
palname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 palette dataset.
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the palette
  • 0 = don't convert
  • 1 = convert all attributes of the image into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 group.
ref_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to attach the palette to an image
  • 0 = don't attach
  • 1 = attach to 'dsetname'.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5image
H4toh5pal
public static void H4toh5pal(int h45id,
                             int riid,
                             java.lang.String parent,
                             java.lang.String dsetname,
                             java.lang.String palgroup,
                             java.lang.String paldset,
                             boolean attr_flag,
                             boolean ref_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert a palette from HDF4 to an palette dataset in HDF5,
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
riid - (IN) The GR image ID of an image that refers to the palette, returned by HDF4 GRselect.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted palette should be inserted.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 image dataset to attach the palette (if none, null).
palgroup - (IN) The absolute path of the HDF5 group to store the palette dataset.
palname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 palette dataset.
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the palette
  • 0 = don't convert
  • 1 = convert all attributes of the image into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 group.
ref_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to attach the palette to an image
  • 0 = don't attach
  • 1 = attach to 'dsetname'.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5image

H4toh5annoobj_label
public static void H4toh5annoobj_label(int h45id,
                                       java.lang.String parent,
                                       java.lang.String datasetname,
                                       int ref,
                                       int tag,
                                       java.lang.String label,
                                       int label_ind) throws H45Exception
          Convert a object label annotation from HDF4 to a attribute of an object in HDF5,
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the HDF5 object is found.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 dataset to attach the annotdaion
ref - (IN) The HDF4 ref for the object the label is attached to,
tag - (IN) The HDF4 tag for the object the label is attached to,
label - (IN) The name of the annotation to convert.
label_ind - (IN) The index of the label.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5obj_alllabels
H4toh5annoobj_desc
public static void H4toh5annoobj_desc(int h45id,
                                      java.lang.String parent,
                                      java.lang.String datasetname,
                                      int ref,
                                      int tag,
                                      java.lang.String desc,
                                      int desc_ind) throws H45Exception
          Convert a object description annotation from HDF4 to a attribute of an object in HDF5,
Parameters:

parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the HDF5 object is found.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 dataset to attach the annotation
ref - (IN) The HDF4 ref for the object the description is attached to,
tag - (IN) The HDF4 tag for the object the description is attached to,
desc - (IN) The name of the annotation to convert.
desc_ind - (IN) The index of the description.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:

                                          java.lang.String parent,
                                          java.lang.String datasetname,
                                          int ref,
                                          int tag) throws H45Exception
          Convert all the object label annotations from an HDF4 object to attributes of an object in HDF5,
Parameters:

parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the HDF5 object is found.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 dataset to attach the annotations
ref - (IN) The HDF4 ref for the object the labels are attached to,
tag - (IN) The HDF4 tag for the object the labesl are attached to,
Throws:

H4toh5alldimscale
public static void H4toh5alldimscale(int h45id,
                                     int sdid,
                                     java.lang.String parent,
                                     java.lang.String dsetname,
                                     java.lang.String dimgroup,
                                     int attr_flag,
                                     int ref_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert all the dimension scales from an HDF4 SDS to a HDF5 dimension datasets,
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
sdid - (IN) An SDS ID, returned by HDF4 SDselect.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group of the dataset to attach.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 dataset to attach the dimensions (if none, null).
dimgroup - (IN) The absolute path of the HDF5 group to store the dimension datasets.
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the dimension
  • 0 = don't convert
  • 1 = convert all attributes of the image into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 group.
ref_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to attach the dimension to the dataset
  • 0 = don't attach
  • 1 = attach to 'dsetname'.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5onedimscale
H4toh5alldimscale
public static void H4toh5alldimscale(int h45id,
                                     int sdid,
                                     java.lang.String parent,
                                     java.lang.String dsetname,
                                     java.lang.String dimgroup,
                                     boolean attr_flag,
                                     boolean ref_flag) throws H45Exception
          Convert all the dimension scales from an HDF4 SDS to a HDF5 dimension datasets,
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
sdid - (IN) An SDS ID, returned by HDF4 SDselect.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group of the dataset to attach.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 dataset to attach the dimensions (if none, null).
dimgroup - (IN) The absolute path of the HDF5 group to store the dimension datasets.
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the dimension
  • false = don't convert
  • true = convert all attributes of the image into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 group.
ref_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to attach the dimension to the dataset
  • false = don't attach
  • true = attach to 'dsetname'.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5onedimscale
H4toh5onedimscale
public static void H4toh5onedimscale(int h45id,
                                     int sdid,
                                     java.lang.String parent,
                                     java.lang.String dsetname,
                                     java.lang.String dimgroup,
                                     java.lang.String dimdataset,
                                     int attr_flag,
                                     int ref_flag,
                                     int dim_ind) throws H45Exception
          Convert one dimension scale from HDF4 to a dataset in HDF5,
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
sdid - (IN) An SDS ID, returned by HDF4 SDselect.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted dimension should be inserted.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 dataset to attach the dimension (if none, null).
dimgroup - (IN) The absolute path of the HDF5 group to store the dimension dataset.
dimdatase - (IN) The name of the HDF5 palette dataset.
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the palette
  • 0 = don't convert
  • 1 = convert all attributes of the image into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 group.
ref_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to attach the palette to an image
  • 0 = don't attach
  • 1 = attach to 'dsetname'.
dim_ind - (IN) The index of the dimension do convert.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
H4toh5alldimscales
H4toh5onedimscale
public static void H4toh5onedimscale(int h45id,
                                     int sdid,
                                     java.lang.String parent,
                                     java.lang.String dsetname,
                                     java.lang.String dimgroup,
                                     java.lang.String dimdataset,
                                     boolean attr_flag,
                                     boolean ref_flag,
                                     int dim_ind) throws H45Exception
          Convert one dimension scale from HDF4 to a dataset in HDF5,
Parameters:
h45id - (IN) The h45id, returned from H4toh5open.
sdid - (IN) An SDS ID, returned by HDF4 SDselect.
parent - (IN) The HDF5 group in which the converted dimension should be inserted.
dsetname - (IN) The name of the HDF5 dataset to attach the dimension (if none, null).
dimgroup - (IN) The absolute path of the HDF5 group to store the dimension dataset.
dimdatase - (IN) The name of the HDF5 palette dataset.
attr_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to convert the attributes of the palette
  • false = don't convert
  • true = convert all attributes of the image into equivalent attributes of the HDF5 group.
ref_flag - (IN) Flag to indicate whether to attach the palette to an image
  • false = don't attach
  • true = attach to 'dsetname'.
dim_ind - (IN) The index of the dimension do convert.
Throws:
HDF45Exception - Error in the java-h4toh5 or the libh4toh5.
See Also:
